headline: From Classrooms to Careers: Dell Simplifies Learning With Purpose-Built Education PCs and Future-Ready Programs
summary: LONDON, January 21, 2026--We're at a critical moment in education. New research and emerging technologies, such as Generative AI, have the potential to reshape how we teach and learn. With decades of leadership in education technology, Dell Technologies is supporting schools in this transformation - equipping students and educators with tools and programs designed for the AI era, ensuring they are prepared for the opportunities ahead.
